summary:
This pack includes 7 meshes:
- 2 Bookshell
- 2 commode
- 1 nightstand
- 1 table
- 1 chair
All models with unique high-resolution textures.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u]Description:[/u][/size]
This pack includes 7 meshes:
- 2 Bookshell
- 2 commode
- 1 nightstand
- 1 table
- 1 chair
All models with unique high-resolution textures.
